core.grammar
Interface Function

All Known Implementing Classes:
FunctionImpl
public interface Function

Interface that defines the methods that are required to create a function to be associated to the Derivation's nodes and applied over the Grammar symbols The interface encapsulates (hides) from the Grammar the several kind of functions to be implemented. It belongs to the Public API.

Author:
Jorge Couchet.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Double applyFunction(java.lang.Double value, double p)
          Apply with probability p the function over the value and returns the result.
 void clearFunction()
          Clear the structures used by the Function Object.
 Function cloneFunction()
          Clone the Functionr, returning a new one.
 Function createFunction()
          Creates and returns a new function.
 double getIncrement()
          Returns the increment associated to the function.
 java.lang.String getOperator()
          Returns the operator associated to the function.
 Function updateFunction(double p)
          Changes (with probability p) the function for a new function and return the new one.
 

Method Detail

applyFunction

java.lang.Double applyFunction(java.lang.Double value,
                               double p)
Apply with probability p the function over the value and returns the result.

Parameters:
value - The value over which the function is applied.
p - The probability used to decide to apply the function or not.

updateFunction

Function updateFunction(double p)
Changes (with probability p) the function for a new function and return the new one.
